EmailTemplate.name: 201912_BK_Americas_Gated-Content_Aerowave-100_amr.Auto-Responder
EmailTemplate.subject: Your white paper is ready!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you!
Here is your “State of Connectivity in General Aviation” white paper. <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/State of Connectivity in General Aviation.pdf]]> AeroWave™ 100 is a satellite communications system that allows you, your co-pilot and your passengers to send text messages, browse the web, send email and make phone calls. It uses the Inmarsat satellite network to enable communication anywhere in the world. Download my white paper <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/State of Connectivity in General Aviation.pdf]]>
